src_original: Wal_9.7 devatā bhagavata ārocayanti abhidoṣakālagato māriṣa udrako rāmaputraḥ /
tgt_original: 』空中諸天亦白佛言： 『此嗢達羅摩子昨夜命過。

src_original: Wal_9.8 bhagavato ’pi samanvāḥrtya jñānadarśanaṁ pravartate / abhidoṣakālagato udrako rāmaputrah /
tgt_original: 』佛亦觀知昨夜命終，復作是念：

src_original: atha bhagavata etad abhavat / mahatī bateyaṁ jyānir udrakasya rāmaputrasya kālakriyāyai ya imaṁ dharmavinayaṁ nāśrauṣīt sacet sa imaṁ dharmavinayam aśroṣyad ajñāsyat sa imaṁ dharmavinayam ity /
tgt_original: 『彼不聞我法失大利益，若得聞法利益無邊。

src_original: Wal_9.9 atha bhagavata etad abhavat / kasya nv ahaṁ prathamato dharmaṁ deśayeyaṁ / atha bhagavata
tgt_original: 』爾時世尊便作是念： 『我欲先為何人說法？

src_original: etad abhavat / yanv ahaṁ paṁcakānāṁ bhikṣūṇāṁ prathamato dharmaṁ deśayeyaṁ ye māṁ pūrvaṁ duḥkhaprahāṇayogam anuyuktaṁ viharantaṁ satkṛtyopatasthuḥ preṁnā ca gauraveṇa ca /
tgt_original: 』復作是念： 『應為彼五人先為說法。 何以故？ 我昔苦行之時，彼等五人信心尊重承事供養。

src_original: Wal_9.10 atha bhagavata etad abhavat / kutra nu paṁcakā bhikṣava etarhi viharaṁti / adrākṣīd
tgt_original: 』復作是念： 『彼等五人今何所在？

src_original: bhagavān divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣeṇa paṁcakā bhikṣavo bārāṇasyāṁ viharanti
tgt_original: 』爾時世尊超人天眼觀察，乃見五人在波羅痆斯仙人墮處施鹿林中。

src_original: ṛṣivadane ṁrgadāpe / Wal_9.11 ḍṛṣṭvā ca punar yathābhiramyaṁ bodhimūle vihṛtya yena bārāṇasī kāśīnāṁ nigamas tena caryāṁ prakrāntaḥ
tgt_original: 見已從菩提樹坐下而起，往詣迦施那國波羅痆斯城，乃路逢一外道，名為親近。

src_original: Section 10 Wal_10.1 tena khalu samayena upaga ājīvikas tasminn eva mārge ’dhvapratipanno ’bhūt / adrākṣīd upaga ājīvako bhagavantaṁ dūrata eva / ḍṛṣṭvā ca punar evam āha / Wal_10.2 viprasannāni te āyuṣman gautama indriyāṇi pariśuddho mukhavaṛṇa paryavadātaś chavivarṇaḥ kas te āyuṣman gautama śāstā kaṁ vāsy uddiśya pravrajitaḥ kasya vā dharmaṁ rocayasi /
tgt_original: 彼見世尊形容端嚴清淨色相善好，問曰： 『具壽喬答摩！

src_original: sa etarhi audārikaṁ cāhāram āhārayati odanakunmāsaṁ sarpistailena gātrāṇi mrakṣayati sukhodakena ca kāyaṁ pariṣiṁcati /
tgt_original: 彼今廣飡美食，所謂酥、蜜、酪等，以酥油塗身香湯洗浴。

src_original: Wal_11.5 so ’smābhir upasaṁkrāṁto nābhivādayitavyo na vanditavyaḥ notthāyāsanenopanimaṁtrayitavyaḥ anyatra prāg evāsanāni prajñapya evaṁ syād vacanīyah / saṁvidyante āyuṣmaṁ gautama
tgt_original: 彼喬答摩來至我所，我等不應起迎頂禮，亦莫喚坐，彼若坐時亦任遠坐。
